meta.title: Services — DCIMAL
meta.description: Cloud, AI, ServiceNow, SAP BTP, DXP, and custom software development services from DCIMAL.

hero.heading: Services
hero.description: Six capabilities. One mission — accelerate your digital transformation with precision and purpose.

items.title: Cloud Solutions
items.description: End-to-end cloud strategy, migration, and optimization. We architect resilient, cost-efficient infrastructure on AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud — enabling your business to scale without limits.

items.title: AI & Data Science
items.description: Turn raw data into competitive advantage. From predictive analytics to computer vision and NLP — we build intelligent systems that automate decisions and uncover insights at scale.

items.title: ServiceNow
items.description: Streamline IT operations and enterprise workflows on the Now Platform. We implement, customize, and optimize ServiceNow to automate your most critical business processes.

items.title: SAP BTP
items.description: Extend and innovate on SAP Business Technology Platform. We connect your SAP ecosystem with modern cloud services, enabling real-time analytics, integration, and intelligent automation.

items.title: Digital Experience Platforms
items.description: Craft compelling digital experiences with enterprise content platforms. We build composable, personalized web experiences that drive engagement and conversion.

items.title: Web & Software Development
items.description: Custom software built for performance, scalability, and maintainability. From JAMStack frontends to complex backend systems — we deliver production-grade code.

steps.title: Discovery
steps.description: We audit your systems, map pain points, and define clear objectives.

steps.title: Strategy
steps.description: We architect a solution with the right technologies and a phased roadmap.

steps.title: Implementation
steps.description: Agile delivery with continuous feedback, testing, and iteration.

steps.title: Support
steps.description: Post-launch monitoring, optimization, and knowledge transfer.
